headline: Gone Boy
abstract: Deepa Anappara’s novel “Djinn Patrol on the Purple Line” probes the secrets of a shantytown as a 9-year-old boy tries to solve the mystery of a classmate’s disappearance.
lead_paragraph: DJINN PATROL ON THE PURPLE LINEBy Deepa Anappara
keywords: Djinn Patrol on the Purple Line (Book)
